categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: In a skirmish at the settlement of Dee'ja Peak on the planet Naboo, the Wookiee bounty hunter Snoova lay in wait for a group of spacers who he had been told were looking for him. Snoova had backup in the form of mercenaries from the Black Sun criminal syndicate. When the spacers came near, Snoova ambushed them and pushed their leader into an alleyway, where the thugs were waiting. In the ensuing fray, Snoova was defeated and his crew fled. The Wookiee bounty hunter revealed to the spacers the information they sought: the location of a Rebel Alliance prisoner Snoova had turned over to another bounty hunter, Bossk.
